chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
x: Dom.elt
dom: Dom.t

Goal:
Proper (Logic.eq ==> eq (dom₂:=dom) ==> eq (dom₂:=Dom.add x dom)) (add A dom x)

Premises:
eq : ∀ dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t, t ?A dom₁ → t ?A dom₂ → Prop where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
Proper = λ (U := Type) (A : U) (R : relation A) (m : A), R m m : ∀ A : Type, relation A → A → Prop Arguments Proper {A}%type_scope _%signature_scope
Module Logic := Struct Inductive True : Prop := I : True Definition True_rect : ∀ P : Type, P → True → P. Definition True_ind : ∀ P : Prop, P → True → P. Definition True_rec : ∀ P : Set, P → True → P. Definition True_sind : ∀ P : SProp, P → True → P. Inductive False : Prop := Definition False_rect : ∀ P : Type, False → P. Definition False_ind : ∀ P : Prop, False → P. Definition False_rec : ∀ P : Set, False → P. Definition False_sind : ∀ P : SProp, False → P. Definition not : Prop → Prop. Inductive and (A B : Prop) : Prop := conj : A → B → A ∧ B Definition and_rect : ∀ (A B : Prop) (P : Type), (A → B → P) → A ∧ B → P. Definition and_ind : ∀ A B P : Prop, (A → B → P) → A ∧ B → P. Definition and
Module Dom : (MSetInterface.SetsOn X) with Definition elt := X.t := S.Dom 
add : ∀ x0 : key, ?A → t ?A ?dom → t ?A (Dom.add x0 ?dom) where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type] ?dom : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Dom.t]
set_compat2 : ∀ (A : Type) (x : key) (dom : Dom.t), Proper (Logic.eq ==> eq (dom₂:=dom) ==> full_relation ==> eq (dom₂:=dom)) (set x)
add_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (v : A) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → eq (add x v m₁) (add y v m₂)
mem_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : Dom.t), Proper (X.eq ==> eq (dom₂:=dom) ==> Logic.eq) mem
find_compat2 : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : Dom.t), Proper (X.eq ==> eq (dom₂:=dom) ==> Logic.eq) find
eq_trans : ∀ (A : Type) (dom₁ dom₂ dom3 : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂) (m3 : t A dom3), eq m₁ m₂ → eq m₂ m3 → eq m₁ m3
eq_sym : ∀ (A : Type) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), eq m₁ m₂ → eq m₂ m₁
PeanoNat.Nat.recursion_wd : ∀ Aeq : relation ?A, Proper (Aeq ==> (Logic.eq ==> Aeq ==> Aeq) ==> Logic.eq ==> Aeq) PeanoNat.Nat.recursion where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
OrdersEx.N_as_OT.recursion_wd : ∀ Aeq : relation ?A, Proper (Aeq ==> (Logic.eq ==> Aeq ==> Aeq) ==> Logic.eq ==> Aeq) OrdersEx.N_as_OT.recursion where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
OrdersEx.Nat_as_DT.recursion_wd : ∀ Aeq : relation ?A, Proper (Aeq ==> (Logic.eq ==> Aeq ==> Aeq) ==> Logic.eq ==> Aeq) OrdersEx.Nat_as_DT.recursion where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
BinNat.N.recursion_wd : ∀ Aeq : relation ?A, Proper (Aeq ==> (Logic.eq ==> Aeq ==> Aeq) ==> Logic.eq ==> Aeq) BinNat.N.recursion where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
OrdersEx.Nat_as_OT.recursion_wd : ∀ Aeq : relation ?A, Proper (Aeq ==> (Logic.eq ==> Aeq ==> Aeq) ==> Logic.eq ==> Aeq) OrdersEx.Nat_as_OT.recursion where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
OrdersEx.N_as_DT.recursion_wd : ∀ Aeq : relation ?A, Proper (Aeq ==> (Logic.eq ==> Aeq ==> Aeq) ==> Logic.eq ==> Aeq) OrdersEx.N_as_DT.recursion where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
set_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : Dom.elt) (v : A) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂) (Hin₁ : Dom.In x dom₁) (Hin₂ : Dom.In y dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → eq (set x v m₁ Hin₁) (set y v m₂ Hin₂)
find_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → find x m₁ = find y m₂
S.remove : ∀ x0 : S.Dom.elt, S.t ?A ?dom → S.t ?A (S.Dom.remove x0 ?dom) where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type] ?dom : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- S.Dom.t]
S.add : ∀ x0 : S.key, ?A → S.t ?A ?dom → S.t ?A (S.Dom.add x0 ?dom) where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type] ?dom : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- S.Dom.t]
S.set : ∀ x0 : S.key, ?A → S.t ?A ?dom → S.Dom.In x0 ?dom → S.t ?A ?dom where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type] ?dom : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- S.Dom.t]
S.fold : (S.key → ?A → ?B → ?B) → ∀ dom0 : S.Dom.t, S.t ?A dom0 → ?B → ?B where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type] ?B : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
S.constant : ∀ dom0 : S.Dom.t, ?A → S.t ?A dom0 where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
S.singleton : ∀ x0 : S.key, ?A → S.t ?A (S.Dom.singleton x0) where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
relation = λ A : Type, A → A → Prop : Type → Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
S.map : ∀ A B : Type, (A → B) → ∀ dom : S.Dom.t, S.t A dom → S.t B dom
incl : ∀ dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t, t ?A dom₁ → t ?A dom₂ → Prop where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
S.from_elements : ∀ l : list (S.key * ?A), S.t ?A (fold_left (λ (acc : S.Dom.t) (xv : S.Dom.elt * ?A), S.Dom.add (fst xv) acc) l S.Dom.empty) where ?A : [A : Type x : Dom.elt dom : Dom.t |- Type]
S.find_spec : ∀ (A : Type) (x : S.key) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), (∃ v : A, S.find x m = Some v) ↔ S.Dom.In x dom
InfA_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (eqA : A → A → Prop), Equivalence eqA → ∀ ltA : A → A → Prop, Proper (eqA ==> eqA ==> iff) ltA → Proper (eqA ==> eqlistA eqA ==> iff) (HdRel ltA)

incl_refl : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : Dom.t), t A dom → Reflexive (incl (dom₂:=dom))
*** [ S.find : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t), S.key → S.t A dom → option A ] Arguments S.find {A}%type_scope {dom}
S.constant_Some : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t) (v : A) (x : S.key) (u : A), S.find x (S.constant dom v) = Some u ↔ S.Dom.In x dom ∧ u = v
S.domain_spec : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), S.domain m = dom

equivlistA_cons_proper : ∀ (A : Type) (eqA : A → A → Prop), Equivalence eqA → Proper (eqA ==> equivlistA eqA ==> equivlistA eqA) cons
*** [ S.domain : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t), S.t A dom → S.Dom.t ] Arguments S.domain {A}%type_scope {dom}

```coq
unfold Proper. unfold eq. unfold eq. intros. unfold add. rewrite H, H0. reflexivity.
Qed.```
